meanings.definition: Training that occurs before the main training program.
meanings.sent1: The pretraining session helped the new employees understand the basics.
meanings.sent2: Before the marathon, the athletes underwent pretraining to build endurance.
meanings.sent3: The pretraining workshop was so engaging that everyone was excited to learn.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to pretraining was like laying a strong foundation for a building.
meanings.sent5: The pretraining involved interactive activities to enhance learning.

meanings.definition: The act of preparing or getting ready for training.
meanings.sent1: Proper pretraining ensures a smooth transition into the actual training.
meanings.sent2: The pretraining checklist helped organize the equipment before the workshop.
meanings.sent3: The pretraining routine included stretching exercises to prevent injuries.
meanings.sent4: His meticulous pretraining resembled a chef preparing ingredients before cooking.
meanings.sent5: The pretraining schedule was carefully planned to optimize learning outcomes.
